spec_data.Name: texinfo
spec_data.Description:
Texinfo is a documentation system that can produce both online
information and printed output from a single source file. The GNU
Project uses the Texinfo file format for most of its documentation.

Install texinfo if you want a documentation system for producing both
online and print documentation from the same source file and/or if you
are going to write documentation for the GNU Project.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sat 05 Aug 2017 07:05:48 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Tools needed to create Texinfo format documentation files
